mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_coupon (AMOUNT, CREATE_TIME, INIT_COUNT, LEFT_COUNT, EFFECT_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME, MERCHANT_ID, PROD_CAT_ID, NAME, BASE_AMOUNT, DESCRIPTION, RECEIVE_START_TIME, RECEIVE_END_TIME,NEED_GET,PROD_ID,DISCOUNT_TYPE) values (#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{initCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{effectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{needGet,jdbcType=BIT}, #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update rc_coupon
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INIT_COUNT = #{initCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEFT_COUNT = #{leftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EFFECT_TIME = #{effectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROD_CAT_ID = #{prodCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BASE_AMOUNT = #{baseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECEIVE_START_TIME = #{receiveStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVE_END_TIME = #{receiveEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NEED_GET = #{needGet,jdbcType=BIT},
PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DISCOUNT_TYPE = #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select COUPON_ID, AMOUNT, CREATE_TIME, INIT_COUNT, LEFT_COUNT, EFFECT_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME, MERCHANT_ID, PROD_CAT_ID, DEL_FLAG, NAME, BASE_AMOUNT, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, RECEIVE_START_TIME, RECEIVE_END_TIME,NEED_GET,PROD_ID,DISCOUNT_TYPE from rc_coupon where COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
